text: This pull request fixes #296, #306, and (IMO) supercedes #297 and #307. It also merges cleanly with my #322.
Is there a release with this fix in? Or a workaround available?

The fix is in the git master branch. You can check it out and use it
directly with pip. Unfortunately it has not been released yet.
